"Sanctum Suppression":
"The Dragonkin of Amduscia are slowly
being indoctrinated. Make contact and
assist where possible.

Defeat any Dragonkin that oppose you,
they are no longer aware of their actions.

――――――――――――――――――――
Clear: Reune [180] Puntos de mision
al derrotar Dragonkin."

"Exterminar a los Dragonkin
para adquirir puntos de mision!"
